constraints.name: inadequate_number_definition
constraints.description: 定义了一种特殊的数列，其中每个数的生成规则基于其在数列中的位置和模11的结果。具体来说，如果x是第m个不充分数，且m除以11的余数为c，则10*x+0, 10*x+1, ..., 10*x+(c-1)都是不充分数，而10*x+c, 10*x+(c+1), ..., 10*x+9不是不充分数。
constraints.formal: Let x be the m-th inadequate number. If m % 11 = c, then 10*x + i is inadequate for 0 ≤ i < c, and not inadequate for c ≤ i ≤ 9.

constraints.name: substring_constraint
constraints.description: 需要计算字符串s中所有子串的数量，这些子串能够形成一个不充分数。如果一个子串在多个位置出现，每次出现都应单独计数。
constraints.formal: Count all substrings of s that form an inadequate number. Each occurrence of a substring is counted separately.
